get_data¶

ucf.get_data(folder_wh_data)[source]¶

Build an inventory of data sets out of individual files within a folder.

Function omits files which are having txt inside their name.

Parameters

folder_wh_data (str) -- Folder in which data files are residing.

Returns

All the data sets generated from individual data files.

Return type

list
